title: An account of the Kings late revenues and debts. Or A true copie of some papers found in the late Archbishop of Canterburies studie, (one of the Commissioners for the Exchequer, An. 1634. and 1635.) Relating to the Kings revenue, debts, and the late Lord Treasurer Portlands gaines by suits, and sale of offices: necessary to be knowne for the common good.
author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.
notes: Attributed by Wing to William Prynne.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
